name: Mouryou Senki Madara 2
overview: Mouryou Senki Madara 2 ("Spirits' Military History Madara 2", or "Record of Spirits War Madara 2") is a Super Famicom RPG from Konami and the sequel to their NES RPG Mouryou Senki Madara. It is based on the manga of the same name, and features a pair of highschool students who are brought to an alternate world filled with monsters and youkai from Japanese mythology. There, they must help the eponymous Prince Madara recover his body parts from demons so he can challenge his father, the Emperor, for the throne.
